articles.author: Matthew Ward Agius
articles.title: Unknown volcano eruption claimed as cause of Black Death - DW
articles.description: Though its route through Central Asia remains elusive, two German researchers believe they have discovered how — and why — the plague made it to Medieval Europe.
articles.content:
A climate catastrophe that forced a rethink in trade routes was probably responsible for introducing the plague to Europe and causing the Black Death in the 14th century, researchers suggest.
